Package github.jcext

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AsyncCallable<T>  
    AsyncRunnable
    AsyncRunnable is considered complete when the resultant CompletionStage is complete.
    Enqueuer.Poller<T>
    Asynchronous single consumer of queued items.
    Enqueuer.QueueCreator  
    TaskEnqueuer.RejectsListener
    This hook may be helpful if you need to count how many times RejectedExecutionException was thrown in mustOffer-methods of TaskEnqueuer.
    Timer
    Unstable API Timer is not used in the core of this lib (only in applications)
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Agent<S>
    Agents provide access to shared mutable state in async fashion.
    Agent.StateValuePair<S,V>  
    Enqueuer<T>
    Enqueuer implements multiple-producer single-consumer pattern, anyone can offer message to the Enqueuer, but only single consumer Enqueuer.Poller can read (poll) it.
    Enqueuer.Conf
    Configuration object.
    EnqueuerBasedEntity  
    JcExt  
    TaskEnqueuer
    TaskEnqueuer is the Enqueuer that polls and executes async tasks AsyncRunnable one by one
    TaskEnqueuer.Conf
    Configuration object.
    Timer.DefaultImpl
